DatasetDescription.Label: Description
DatasetDescription.Description: A brief description of the dataset
DatasetDescription.Value: This dataset includes healthcare records to train AI models.

DatasetVersion.Label: Version
DatasetVersion.Description: The version number of the dataset

DatasetPublisher.Label: Publisher
DatasetPublisher.Description: The organization responsible for publishing the dataset

DatasetLicense.Label: License
DatasetLicense.Description: The license under which the dataset is shared

PurposeOfDataCollection.Label: Purpose
PurposeOfDataCollection.Description: The reason for collecting the data

Beneficiaries.Label: Beneficiaries
Beneficiaries.Description: The groups who benefit from the dataset

SourceOfData.Label: Source
SourceOfData.Description: Where the data was collected from

OriginOfData.Label: Origin
OriginOfData.Description: The original location or institution responsible for the data

CollectionPeriod.Label: Collection Period
CollectionPeriod.Description: The time period during which the data was collected

GenderDistribution.Label: Gender Distribution
GenderDistribution.Description: The distribution of gender in the dataset

AgeDistribution.Label: Age Distribution
AgeDistribution.Description: The age distribution in the dataset

SocioeconomicDistribution.Label: Socioeconomic Distribution
SocioeconomicDistribution.Description: Socioeconomic distribution of the data subjects

GeographicDistribution.Label: Geographic Distribution
GeographicDistribution.Description: Geographic location of the dataset subjects

MediaType.Label: Media Type
MediaType.Description: The type of data contained in the dataset

IncompletionOfData.Label: Incompletion of Data
IncompletionOfData.Description: Whether the dataset has incomplete data

AppliedBiasMitigationMethods.Label: Bias Mitigation Methods
AppliedBiasMitigationMethods.Description: Methods used to mitigate bias in the dataset
AppliedBiasMitigationMethods.Value: Ensured a representative sample of age groups and genders

PresenceOfPersonalData.Label: Personal Data
PresenceOfPersonalData.Description: Whether the dataset contains personal data

CategoriesOfData.Label: Data Categories
CategoriesOfData.Description: The types of personal data included

SensitivityOfData.Label: Sensitivity Level
SensitivityOfData.Value: Health data is considered highly sensitive.

Jurisdiction.Label: Jurisdiction
Jurisdiction.Description: The legal jurisdiction governing the dataset

LegalRiskLevel.Label: Legal Risk Level
LegalRiskLevel.Description: The level of legal risk associated with using the data
LegalRiskLevel.Value: Some legal risk due to sensitive health information

ImpactAssessment.Label: Impact Assessment
ImpactAssessment.Value: Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA) was conducted

OtherRisks.Label: Other Risks
OtherRisks.Description: Additional risks associated with the dataset
OtherRisks.Value: Re-identification risks are minimal but present

OverallRiskLevel.Label: Overall Risk Level
OverallRiskLevel.Value: Overall risk is moderate due to the nature of the data

AppliedRiskMitigationMethods.Label: Risk Mitigation Methods
AppliedRiskMitigationMethods.Description: Mitigation methods applied to minimize risks

AccessRestrictions.Label: Access Restrictions
AccessRestrictions.Value: Access restricted to authorized personnel only

ProhibitiveRestrictions.Label: Prohibitive Restrictions
ProhibitiveRestrictions.Description: Restrictions on certain types of usage

ObligatoryRestrictions.Label: Obligatory Restrictions
ObligatoryRestrictions.Value: Users must acknowledge the dataset source
